headline.main: NAZI AGENT'S STORY READ AT SPY TRIAL; Court Hears Statement Made by Axel Wheeler-Hill to FBI When He Was Seized

lead_paragraph: An admission by one of the defendants that he transmitted to Germany information on the shipment of United States war cargoes to Great Britain was read into the record yesterday as the Brooklyn espionage trial entered its fourth week.
abstract: Wheeler-Hill's statement to FBI on sending ship data by mail and on radio transmitter put in record; M Freundt testifies, Bklyn
snippet: An admission by one of the defendants that he transmitted to Germany information on the shipment of United States war cargoes to Great Britain was read into the record yesterday as the Brooklyn espionage trial entered its fourth week....
